column4: hey guys, I can't get my mic working in Ubuntu. ALSA is giving me on hell of a time.
I've compiled the module, and also installed the one in the repos
is there any way to make it work?
is it enabled? is the volume all the way down? make sure
yup, the basic stuff is all done
I can't even test the ALSA sound. It gives me that unable to access blah blah error
I'm using OSS at the moment, but mic is no good
it's considered under the Intel HDA codec
but I find that a solution that applies to one doesn't apply to all
so on alsa, you can't play any sound at all?
yeah, no sound with ALSA. I had it working on and off, but it's really on and off
I can't find anything on google, forums, or anywhere with this problem
yeah, same here =/. Thanks for trying to help though, it was good
i suggest you find a way to get your microphone just working on oss
hmm... I'll try heh. Thanks. Oh actually, do you know how to get a usb mic working with linux? for some reason when I recompiled the ALSA drivers, I ended up deleting the USB support =S
